SEARCH
Package engine.forPlayer.forAI

Class RookStructureAnalyzer

java.lang.Object
engine.forPlayer.forAI.RookStructureAnalyzer
public final class RookStructureAnalyzer extends Object
The RookStructureAnalyzer class is responsible for analyzing the rook structure on the chess board, calculating bonuses based on open files for rooks, and providing a score for rook-related factors.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static final int
    ConnectedRookBonus
    Bonus applied when the rooks can "see" each other on the board.
    private static final int
    HalfOpenFileBonus
    Bonus applied when there is a half open file controlled by the player's rook.
    private static final RookStructureAnalyzer
    Instance
    The singleton instance of RookStructureAnalyzer.
    private static final int
    OpenFileControlBonus
    Bonus applied for rooks on an open file.
    private static final int
    RookLiftBonus
    Bonus applied when a rook can lift itself to a higher rank position on the board.
    private static final int
    UnsafeKingBonus
    Bonus applied when a rook threatens the opponents king.
